title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Cemetery Ridge Rehab Project  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Cemetery Ridge Rehab Project  The parking area and sidewalks for the Soldiersâ€™ National Cemetery at Gettysburg National Military Park along Taneytown Road will close on July 11 for up to six months for a construction project. Detours and temporary access points have been established. more
